item.title: Lotto upgrading website to avoid chaos with big draws
item.description:
A major upgrade of New Zealand's Lotto website is underway in a bid to avoid any more online chaos after big draws.
And as more people turn to online ticket purchasing in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic ...
